title: Introducing: Yunō
content:
Yunō is the side project of summer anthem virtuoso Unouomedude and witnesses him exploring a more psychedelic aspect to his creational output.

Debut track Disney World is solely instrumental, and attempts to recreate a repetitive dream experienced by the protagonist. Comprised largely of sampled vocals and looped synths, Yunō constructs a lucid yet ambiguous world within which the track gyrates. Download Disney World below and keep an eye out for future releases.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
